info.name: 4chan - Deep Shadow
info.description:
Saxamaphone !3.saxN0DHY with:
Deep Shadow (v1.0)

A dark, clean and unified layout for DEFAULT 4chan.
If you use 4chan extension, 4chan4chrome or any UserScripts, you'll have to do some work.

FOR A BRIGHTER VERSION: http://userstyles.org/styles/41101

Featuring:
hovering navbar
custom postarea
hovering pages box
full width replies
NO checkboxes (meaning NO reporting and NO post deleting)
removes ADS, LINES ACROSS THE PAGE and OTHER USELESS SHIT

Changelog:
14/12/10 - Initial release.
